person.persName: Nicholas T. Berry (Marion County, KY, Circuit Court Clerk)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, court clerk. Nelson County, Kentucky, native. Married to Josephine Boucher Berry in 1855. Father of Samuel B. Berry. Married to Nancy H. Phillips Berry in Marion County, Kentucky on March 16, 1858. Attended Mount Merino College in Breckinridge County. Studied law under R. H. Rowntree. Member of the Roman Catholic Church. Clerk in Marion County in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Circuit court clerk in Marion County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860.
